thought: To craft stripped_crimson_hyphae, I need to place two stripped_crimson_stems next to each other on the crafting grid. The closest available stripped_crimson_stem is located at slot 30, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1
